note:
A raccoon living in the Greater Toronto Area. I'm a hobby artist who just wants to draw cute women *and* find people who want to see them. Tooting/boosting a lot of 18+ stuff, but always behind a content warning (and mine are tagged #lewd).

I usually only boost media with alt text, to promote accessibility.

â—¾ Ottawa Senators fan who doesn't know what to believe anymore
â—¾ Draws in IbisPaint on an Android phone
â—¾ Older than the Internet
â—¾ He/him

fields.name: Avatar Description
fields.value: A drawing of a young woman with caribou antlers and long droopy ears, and a collar with jingle bells. She has a pouty look on her face

fields.name: Banner Description
fields.value: A close-up drawing of a woman's head and bust with roses around her.  She's lying back and looking up with wide eyes
